ProductInfo.Features:
Build-in 30 infrared LEDs. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
NTSC signal system. 420TVL. Build-in 3.6mm Lens for wide angle view
Affordable day night vision CMOS security camera
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Can be mounted on wall or ceiling
Package included: 1 x bullet camera, 1 x camera bracket, 1 x  preamp microphone, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 x extension cable and 1 x security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Day Night Outdoor Wide Angle Surveillance Security Camera Infrared IR for Home Video DVR System with Preamp Microphone, Power Supply, Extension Cable and Free Security Warning Decal WI5
